mapper.select: select d.delivery_id, d.deliver_id, d.delivery_time, ds.storage_id, ds.nums, m.medicine_name from delivery d left join delivery_storage ds on ds.delivery_id= ds.delivery_id left join storage s on s.storage_id = ds.storage_id left join medicine m on m.medicine_id = s.medicine_id where p.delivery_id = #{deliveryId}
